mapper.select:
select
from sys_real_name_authentication where VIN = #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AUTHENTICATION_RESULT IN ('0','1','2')

select
from sys_real_name_authentication where AUTHENTICATION_ID = #{authenticationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AUTHENTICATION_RESULT = '2'

select
from sys_real_name_authentication where AUTHENTICATION_ID = #{authenticationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AUTHENTICATION_RESULT IN ('1','2')

select
from sys_real_name_authentication where AUTHENTICATION_ID = #{authenticationId} AND AUTHENTICATION_TYPE IN ('1','2')

select AUTHENTICATION_ID from sys_real_name_authentication
AUTHENTICATION_ID IN ${authenticationId} AND AUTHENTICATION_TYPE IN ('1','2')

select
from sys_real_name_authentication where AUTHENTICATION_ID = #{authenticationId} AND AUTHENTICATION_TYPE in ('1','2') and AUTHENTICATION_RESULT = '2'
